JOB FAMILY SUMMARY:
This team is responsible for managing the relationship with our strategic accounts.  This includes but is not limited to improving the relationship/partnership, expanding the relationship through additional products and acting as a single point of contact for the customer.

JOB SUMMARY: 
A Senior Strategic Account Executive is responsible for strategic selling and utilizing relationship management skills to educate prospective high value target customers on the value of Mindbody software. The incumbent will partner with solutions consultants, product development teams and other cross functional leaders to develop custom proposals/solutions for our prospects.  The Senior Strategic Account Executive will look to become the prospect’s trusted advisor who deeply understands their unique company challenges and goals.

MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS AND REQUIREMENTS: 
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience 
• Eight (8) years of business to business (B2B) sales with annual revenue targets, with some of the work experience specifically in large complex corporations with long sales cycles
• Must have consistently met or exceeded their annual revenue goals
• Strong analytical skills, sound business judgment, and a high level of initiative, creativity and flexibility
• Demonstrated experience with strategic outbound prospecting
• Demonstrated ability to maintain sales funnel including detailed and accurate forecasting
• Expert negotiation and closing skills for large complex organizations including those that utilize procurement offices
• Demonstrated experience working across the C-Suite both internally and externally
• Excellent time management and organizational skills, ability to prioritize and use time effectively and efficiently. Demonstrated ability to meet internal and external deadlines
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to communicate in a clear and concise manner to a C-level audience
• Demonstrated ability to operate in a fast-paced and high stress environment, balancing both strategic and tactical responsibilities
• Demonstrated ability to interact with team members and customers in a tactful and professional manner and recognizes the importance of building and fostering professional and positive working relationships

PRINCIPAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Development of new business opportunities through proactive identification and qualification of critical contacts within assigned accounts and targets.
• Develop and implement account strategies and sales plans to achieve and exceed revenue targets.
• Anticipate and mitigate prospect challenges through proactive engagement methodologies.
• Build and/or maintain a current and appropriate high-level understanding of prospect related critical business goals and issues in order to have independent, productive conversations with key persona.
• Manage up-to-date activity, planning, and forecasting of all qualified opportunities throughout the sales process to closure status. Provide a detailed and reliable revenue forecast by customer, by product, by month and by sales stage.
• Develop and deliver presentations, proposals and RFP responses to meet expressed and anticipated customer needs.
• Build sales funnel, detailed territory reviews and relationship maps.
• Provide feedback to cross functional internal partners on solution development efforts that best address customer needs.
• Collaborate with API teams and Partners to find seamless solutions using the entire Mindbody Ecosystem.
• Provide leadership to client services team members in departmental and corporate initiatives.
• Active participation at industry meetings and conferences as required to represent Mindbody.
• Lead and mentor team members. 
• All other duties as assigned.
• Demonstrates and pitches Mindbody software to prospective customers.
